function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease propagation due to HVAC system malfunction or inefficiency","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the building, leading to illness and absenteeism","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of HVAC systems, airborne infection control measures, improving indoor air quality","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation systems, UV germicidal irradiation","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facilities maintenance team"},{"Description":"Inaccurate simulation results leading to incorrect conclusions","Impact":"Misleading conclusions about the functionality of HVAC systems and their impact on contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Validation of simulation models against real-world data, sensitivity analysis of input parameters, peer review of results","Technologies":"Simulation validation tools, data analytics software, sensitivity analysis software","People":"Research team, data analysts, simulation modelers","Owner":"Research team, project lead"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of optimization results leading to suboptimal decision-making","Impact":"Suboptimal building design or operation, resulting in higher energy consumption and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Thorough analysis of optimization results, consideration of multiple objectives, expert review of decision-making process","Technologies":"Multi-objective optimization algorithms, decision support systems, building energy simulation tools","People":"Building designers, energy analysts, decision-makers","Owner":"Building design team, energy management team"}]}
